HTML Reports Only VIs

Requires: Base Development System. This topic might not match its corresponding palette in LabVIEW depending on your operating system, licensed product(s), and target.

Use the HTML Reports Only VIs to manipulate HTML reports you create in LabVIEW.

The VIs on this palette can return report generation error codes.

Palette ObjectDescription
Append Horizontal Line to ReportCreates a horizontal rule in an HTML report.
Append Hypertext Link Anchor to ReportCreates and adds a hypertext link anchor to a HTML report.
Append User Formatted HTML to ReportInserts text that is not preformatted by LabVIEW in the HTML report.
Open HTML Report in BrowserDisplays an HTML report in the default Web browser. Wire data to the report in input to determine the polymorphic instance to use or manually select the instance.
